name: Pinbrawl
description:
Note: Two or more controllers required to play.

Pinbrawl is a local multiplayer pinball deathmatch game featuring juicy, cartoon-like action and hilarious physics-based characters used to smack the ball around colorful, 4-way pinball tables and score on your friends. Tons of game settings, play modes and different stages help to keep things spicy, offering loads of modifiers and replayability for you and your pals.

For full release, we are planning on having:
• 8 playable stages
• Multiple game modes
• A colorful cast of 7-8 unique characters. 

Pinbrawl has won a couple awards during it's development at local game conventions, including Best Visuals at Minnesota's 2D Con 2016, and Best Gameplay and Best Multiplayer Game at 2D Con 2017.

Disclaimer: This is not a finished game. Pinbrawl is available for early purchase on itch.io for the sole purpose of allowing community engagement and feedback for the purpose of making Pinbrawl a better game. All users that buy Pinbrawl on itch.io will be given a Steam key when that time comes! In the meanwhile, please jump into the discussion on the /PinbrawlGame subreddit or itch.io message board. Submit character ideas, discuss the merits and downfalls of new content, and report bugs so we can keep the game running as smoothly as possible for everyone!
